name: Rogue of the Seven Seas
description:
Developed for 7DRL 2021.

You wish for life out at sea, so you venture from your town to begin a life as a sea-trader, beginning with a simple dingy and 100 coins to your name. Buy stock so you can travel to other ports to sell them, buy upgrades to improve your ship and hire a crew.

If you're particularly risky, you can battle other transport ships, as well as pirate ships, to get their stock to sell on. How far can you go at a life at sea?

Keyboard controls only:

North = Up, W, or Numpad 8
South = Down, X, or Numpad 2
East = Right, D, or Numpad 6
West = Left, A, or Numpad 4
North-East = E or Numpad 9
North-West = Q or Numpad 7
South-East = C or Numpad 3
South-West = Z or Numpad 1
Select = S, Space, or Numpad 5
Pause = Escape
